Ridiculous Crap from Other Websites (Sasquatch)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Ridiculous Crap from Other Websites (Sasquatch)
By Nate Railsback on Thursday, August 3, 2000 - 07:43 pm:

I turned up this little "gem" at Cheat Codes .Com- I shudder to think how I used to consider it a reliable site.

"Sasquatch-
First, obtain the Jill monster. Use Jill in the Pappas errantry at least ten times in a row, without resting for a single week. Next, rest your monster for 10 months in a row. Go to the Pappas errantry ten more times in a row. Save the game at this point. Approximately one year later, it will die. Hold Start + Select to reset the game. Then, bring your Jill to the village and combine it with a Golem using the "Big Footstep" as a seasoning. This should result in a Sasquatch. Note: This may take several attempts."

By Trickster on Thursday, August 3, 2000 - 08:42 pm:

Someone has a *really* sadistic sense of humor.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 3, 2000 - 10:33 pm:

Just points out the value of having a good staff of moderators! (Mine are pretty good!)
